home_vision_second: We provide creative designs, high-quality print products and various advertising services to all clients from small start-ups to high profile business owners. home_vision_second2: If you are the owner of a growing company looking to advance your business in a modern yet professional fashion; we can help you to achieve your goal.
home_PHILOSOPHY_second: While quality and precision are fundamental components of our work, the relationship with our clients has undoubtedly remained the core element of success that has always been a companion of the KIC journey.

home_history2: Since the establishment of KIC in 1993 by the founder Atef Jebreal, the firm has been developed to include all computer and design services under its umbrella. We have built our reputation based on trust and quality with our clients.
About_Banner_three: We are a creative design, social media, branding and printing agency based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, made of graphic designers, art directors, social media strategists, and creative directors. Our team come from different backgrounds: we seek for diversity and innovative minds.
About_Banner_four: KIC was established in 1993 by the founder Atef Jebreal, since then KIC has proven to add that extra spark to your business no matter where you are!
About_Banner_five: We have built our reputation based on trust and quality with our clients.
About_Content_two: From idea generation, to creative execution, we can create targeted and impactful campaigns to reach your target audience.
About_Content_three: With an extensive portfolio of happy clients, we love nothing more than creating a campaign that works and achieves results. No matter the platform, from Facebook to Twitter to Programmatic, we can help!
Service_Banner_one: We handle everything linked to branding, social media, digital design, and consultancy, Our goal is to help our clients grow and gain exposure with the right designs, tone of voice, and tools.
service_Graphic_tow: Design graphics to meet specific commercial  or promotional needs, such as packaging, displays, logos, or imagery or print and digital uses including banner ads, social media posts, website graphics, magazine advertorials, etc.
service_printing_two: We provide customers with timely, high-quality, more comprehensive design, plate-making, multi-color printing, processing, and gradually form a variety of exquisite picture books, posters, product samples, high-end color boxes, calendars, desk calendars, and other printing products.
service_web_two: A professional website is the face of your company. We always study the market and the target audience before designing and developing any professional websites.
service_marketing_two: Our digital agency provides a whole team of experts for your project. This means a lot of creative discussions, brainstorming and marketing solutions to give you the best result you need. Two heads are better than one.
